nodes.text: Jonashe Solo was a Corellian male who was a member of the ancient Corellian royalty and held the title of Prince-Admiral.

Han Solo told an Imperial recruitment officer that he did not have a family and as a result, the officer listed the new recruit as "Han Solo." However, according to one Snivvian bounty hunter, Han was a direct descendant of Jonashe Solo, and the story about how Han's last name was invented by the recruitment officer was deliberate disinformation.
